## Installation {background-image="figure/backgrounds/default.png" background-size="contain"}

* Required
  * R (≥ 4.2)
  * rstan (≥ 2.21.8)
  * measr (≥ 0.3.1)

* Recommended
  * RStudio (≥ 2023.03.1+446)
  * cmdstanr (≥ 0.5.3)
  * CmdStan (≥ 2.32.2)

## Copy and run {background-image="figure/backgrounds/default.png" background-size="contain"}

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
install.packages(c("measr", "fs", "usethis"))


# Optional
install.packages(c("rstan", "StanHeaders", "cmdstanr"),
                 repos = c("https://mc-stan.org/r-packages", getOption("repos")))

## check toolchain
cmdstanr::check_cmdstan_toolchain()
cmdstanr::install_cmdstan(cores = 2)
```

For help installing RStan, CmdStanR, or configuring the toolchain, see the [prework page](materials/prework.qmd).
